author: Wouter Bosch
description: The ingredients might suggest that this cocktail should be stirred â€“ I tried, but it benefits from the dilution and life that shaking imparts. After some elbow grease, you'll have a delicious bittersweet, herbal almond, after-dinner drink.
name: Ill Viaggio

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
